entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Blanc-Sablon
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
